thread.title: Carl Cossins
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Carl Cossins

author: Carl Cossins
title: Carl Cossins
text: Kyle over at the Ford Rd. location in Canton is phenomenal. He has sold us numerous pieces and they are all wonderful. The movers are also wonderful and super helpful and clean up after they are done. I won't buy furniture from anyone else but Kyle!
